ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 65
ygData.msgSnippet: Long time listener, first time caller- What does everyone think about possibly giving Warriors a MINIMUM amount of damage done? For example, Im level 16
ygData.messageBody:
Long time listener, first time caller-

What does everyone think about possibly giving Warriors a MINIMUM amount
of damage done? For example, Im level 16 wielding either a Dwarven 2Hand Axe
(best 2hander up until SBH you can get it off Lord Darish in Crushbone) or a
Combine LongSword and Tentacle Whip. Most of the time, I hit for 28, 29, 30
with the Dwarven 2Hander, but occasionally, I hit for somewhere in the range of
1-10. Personally I think that sucks. Now, what if Verant were to give Warriors
a minumum amount of damage they could do? For example, this Dwarven 2Hander is
14dmg 43delay. It would be nice if we could never hit for below 14 with this
item. Also, a Combine LS is 6dmg 28delay, so we could never hit for below 6
with the Combine LS.

I think this is a reasonable idea and in some cases would be better than
5-10 damage extra. Just think, NEVER hitting for 1 damage again. I personally
think in a realistic sense, a big Barbarian Warrior with 130STR wielding a huge
Dwarven 2Hander hitting something for 1 damage is kind of pitiful. What do you
all think?

-Gaidal Cain
Medieval Bulldozer
Barbarian Warrior of the 16th Tier, Tarew Marr
